summary: Implements the HTTP response layer for the mocked AWS Lambda service, translating incoming API calls into backend operations such as creating, updating, deleting functions, aliases, versions, layers, event source mappings, permissions, concurrency settings, URLs, and tags, and formatting the corresponding JSON responses.
business_intent: Provides a fully featured mock of the AWS Lambda API so that developers can test Lambda integrations and workflows locally without contacting the real AWS service.
